document.full_text: police have found the body of 20-year-old krista dittmeyer, the missing maine woman whose 14-month-old child was found insider her still running car, authorities said on wednesday.
document.title: missing maine mother's body found
lines_and_colors: police have found the body of 20-year-old krista dittmeyer, the missing maine woman whose 14-month-old child was found insider her still running car, authorities said on wednesday.
